messages.subject: Cool Book on Seinan/Satsuma War (in Japanese)
messages.msgSnippet: Both books are in Japanese...I m posting them for people who are seriously studying this time period this book was in my univ. library...pretty cool book it
messages.messageBody:
Both books are in Japanese...I'm posting them for people who are
seriously studying this time period

this book was in my univ. library...pretty cool book it even has a
pic of Toshiyoshi Kawaji...the book is about the Seinan War

Sh¯ushinkai].
